content.bannerNote: Please note: Your ufirst account offers European Travel Insurance. In order to be covered for this benefit you will need to register directly with the insurance provider. Select the Explore button below to find out more information on how you can register.

content.heading: Enjoy the full range of banking, protection and lifestyle benefits
content.content: With a ufirst account from Ulster Bank you could enjoy 25% cash back on up to 4 tickets for events, travel discounts, an interest free arranged overdraft of up to €500 and lots more. The monthly account fee for the ufirst account is €10. The ufirst account also has additional insurance and protection benefits at no extra cost. * You need to register or apply for some benefits.

benefit.title: European Travel Insurance
benefit.content: European cover for you and your family- perfect for your summer holiday and more!

benefit.title: Travel Service
benefit.content: 10% discount off weekend breaks, hotels, holidays, car hire and overseas travel.

benefit.title: Ticket Booking
benefit.content: Enjoy 25% cash back off event tickets throughout the Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland and the rest of the UK.

benefit.title: Interest free arranged overdraft
benefit.content: You can apply for an interest free overdraft of up to €500 **(0% variable).**

benefit.title: Tailored rates on personal loans
benefit.content: You can enjoy a 1% discount on our standard fixed rates when you apply for an Ulster Bank loan.

benefit.title: Tailored rates on personal mortgages
benefit.content: Apply for an Ulster Bank mortgage and you can enjoy tailored variable mortgage rates.

benefit.title: Interest when your account is in credit
benefit.content: Whether you have €1 or €10,000 in your ufirst Private account, credit interest will be added to your account every month.

benefit.title: Ulster Bank Car Insurance discount
benefit.content: You are eligible for a 10% discount off your first year’s Ulster Bank Car Insurance discount premium.

benefitBlocks.heading: Manage your sign in details
benefitBlocks.blockText: This is where you can change your personal details or password.

benefitBlocks.heading: View your past interactions with your benefits
